dict.string: Create calendar events in Fantastical using natural language powered by OpenAI for intelligent parsing and reliable event creation
FOCAL - Fantastical Calendar Assistant for Alfred
Natural language event (e.g., "Lunch tomorrow at noon")

FOCAL - Fantastical OpenAI Calendar Alfred Link
This workflow transforms natural language into perfectly formatted Fantastical calendar events using OpenAI's advanced language processing.
WHY THIS WORKFLOW? Fantastical's natural language parser, while powerful, can be finicky about syntax and word order. This workflow uses OpenAI to ensure your events are always formatted correctly, reducing errors and failed event creation.
FEATURES: • Intelligent date/time parsing • Automatic location extraction • Recurring event support • Fallback to direct parsing if API unavailable • Secure API key storage
USAGE: Type 'focal' followed by your event in natural language: • focal Lunch with Sarah tomorrow at noon • focal Team standup every Monday at 10am • focal Doctor appointment next Friday at 3:30pm at Medical Center
SETUP: 1. Install the workflow 2. Add your OpenAI API key (instructions included) 3. Start creating events with natural language
Version 2.1.1 Created by Eric Bowman https://github.com/ebowman/focal
